name: earner
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone or something that earns money: In most of these cases, the woman is the sole earner in the family.a nice little earner UK informal That hamburger stand is a nice little earner (= makes a lot of money). See also
wage earner

Add to word list
Add to word list
someone or something that earns money: tax credit programs for low-wage earners
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who earns money for work that they do: Today's students are tomorrow's earners.high/low/average earners High earners did not really notice they were paying more tax. high-income/middle-income/low-income earners The package would establish higher income-tax rates for top earners but include breaks for lower- and middle-class workers.
a product or business activity that makes money for a person or company: Insurance is a big earner for the UK economy. profit/revenue/foreign-exchange earners See also
wage earner
